mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheduleship (idship, volume, note, arrivaldate, departuredate, rif_mct) VALUES (#{idship}, #{volume}, #{note}, #{arrivaldate}, #{departuredate}, #{rif_mct});
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.idship, s.volume, s.note, s.arrivaldate, s.departuredate, s.rif_mct, sh.name FROM scheduleship s, ship sh where s.idship = sh.id and s.id = #{id_scheduleShip};
SELECT s.id, s.idship, s.volume, s.note, s.arrivaldate, s.departuredate, sh.name, s.rif_mct FROM scheduleship s, ship sh where s.idship = sh.id order by s.arrivaldate DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE scheduleship SET idship = #{idship}, volume = #{volume}, note = #{note}, arrivaldate = #{arrivaldate}, departuredate = #{departuredate}, rif_mct = #{rif_mct} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detailscheduleship (idscheduleship, shift, operation, iduser, idseconduser, handswork, menwork, shiftdate, notedetail) VALUES (#{idscheduleship}, #{shift},#{operation},#{iduser},#{idseconduser},#{handswork},#{menwork},#{shiftdate}, #{notedetail});
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.idscheduleship, d.shift, d.operation, d.iduser, d.notedetail, d.idseconduser, d.handswork, d.menwork, d.shiftdate, concat(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS firstOperativeName, concat(us.lastname, ' ', us.firstname) AS secondOperativeName FROM detailscheduleship d left join user us ON (d.idseconduser = us.id), user u where d.id = #{id_detailScheduleShip} and d.iduser = u.id order by d.shift asc;

SELECT SUM(handswork) as totalhands, SUM(menwork) as totalmen FROM ( SELECT d.handswork, d.menwork FROM detailscheduleship d left join user us ON (d.idseconduser = us.id), user u, ship s, scheduleship ss where
(s.name like CONCAT('%',#{full_text_search}, '%') ) and
d.shift = #{shift} and
d.idscheduleship = ss.id and ss.idship = s.id and d.iduser = u.id and date(ss.arrivaldate) >= date(#{dateFrom}) and date(#{dateTo}) >= date(ss.arrivaldate) ) as detail;
